mapper.sql: id, orgid, code, name, onlycode, type, nature, linkman, linknumber, address, remark, creater, createtime, modify, modifytime, desc1, desc2, desc3, desc4
mapper.select:
select
from file_merchant
and code like "%" #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and onlycode like "%" #{onlycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and type like "%" #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and name like "%" #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and desc1 = #{desc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by createtime desc
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(0) from file_merchant
and code like "%" #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and onlycode like "%" #{onlycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and type like "%" #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and name like "%" #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and desc1 = #{desc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update file_merchant
orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
onlycode = #{onlycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
